member.name: T:Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.CompositeView.CompositeViewEngine
member.summary: Composition of view engines that dispatch to one or other based on the view file extesion.

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Views.CompositeView.CompositeViewEngine.Process(System.IO.TextWriter,Castle.MonoRail.Framework.IRailsEngineContext,Castle.MonoRail.Framework.Controller,System.String)
